review.comment: Attorney Leslie and Herson provided us with diligent representation for my husbands reckless driving Summon. Representation resulted in no criminal record for his case, no blemish on his driving record, and we didn’t have to go to the court (which was a big relief as we r from NYC). Angie was very professional and supportive, updating me on the court hearing.  Also, their process for their service was affordable, straightforward and hassle free! Thank you so much for your successful results.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review, Aniundita. We love getting feedback like yours. Glad everything worked out in your husband's case.

review.comment:
Pierre Priale provided perfect advice during a difficult situation. I believe he did so because he genuinely cared. It was not for greed or anything of the sort. He spent his valuable time advising me, and without him, perhaps the outcome would have been much worse. In fact, everything worked out quite well.

If you're reading this Mr. Priale, thank you very much. I will try to pay it forward if I ever have the opportunity. And I won't forget your invaluable advice!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review, your kind words, and thank you for trusting me enough to follow my advice. I'm glad it all worked out for the best. Do reach out if you ever need our help.
